channel.title: Boolean Comparators :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Python also uses various comparators to allow us to compare values of many different data types to produce a Boolean value. We can compare numbers, strings, and many other data types in Python using these comparators. The basic comparators in Python are: == equal != not equal < less than <= less than or equal to > greater than >= greater than or equal to Notice that the equal comparator in Python now uses two equals signs == instead of a single one.
